trans-unit.source: Defines a mouse input gesture that can be used to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un movimento dell'input del mouse che può essere usato per richiamare un comando.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> does not have to be paired with <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> to be a valid MouseGesture.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>non deve essere abbinato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>sia un valido MouseGesture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: A MouseGesture can be bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> (or other <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementations) through a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> so that the command is invoked when the MouseGesture occurs.
trans-unit.target: Un MouseGesture può essere associato a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>(o altri <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>implementazioni) tramite un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>in modo che il comando viene richiamato quando si verifica il MouseGesture.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: For MouseGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute usages, the property that is generally set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>, in cases where the gesture can represent both a mouse action and one or more modifier key.
trans-unit.target: Per MouseGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] gli utilizzi degli attributi, la proprietà che è in genere impostata in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] è <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>, nei casi in cui l'azione può rappresentare sia un'azione del mouse e uno o più tasti di modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> property to be just a mouse action.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>proprietà sia solo un'azione del mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], rather than setting <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>, even if you do not specify modifiers.
trans-unit.target: In generale, è consigliabile utilizzare solo il <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>dall'attributo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], anziché impostare <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>, anche se non si specificano modificatori.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Ciò consente di evitare ambiguità, fornisce la sintassi più semplice e la rappresentazione in forma più semplice per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: MouseGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] object element usages are possible but uncommon, because you can ordinarily set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> inline without the use of property element syntax.
trans-unit.target: MouseGesture [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] gli utilizzi degli elementi oggetto sono possibili ma non comune, perché in genere, è possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>inline senza utilizzare la sintassi degli elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `mouseAction` A single mouse action.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # valori XAML `mouseAction` un'azione del mouse.

trans-unit.source: `oneOrMoreModifierKeys` One or more modifier keys, defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: `oneOrMoreModifierKeys`Uno o più tasti di modifica, definiti per il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>enumerazione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: If more than one modifier key is provided, each modifier key is delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: Se viene specificato più di un tasto di modifica, ogni chiave di modificatore è delimitata con un carattere "+".

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The action associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: L'azione associata a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: mouseAction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: mouseActionnon è un valido valore.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The action associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: L'azione associata a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: The modifiers associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: I modificatori associati a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: mouseAction is not a valid value -or- modifiers is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: mouseActionnon è un valido valore - oppure - modifiers non è un valido valore.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> matches the input associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> corrisponde all'input associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The target.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The input event data to compare with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: I dati dell'evento di input da confrontare con questa azione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event data matches this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i dati dell'evento corrispondano a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the modifier keys associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i tasti di modifica associati a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> does not have to be paired with <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> in order to be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>non deve essere abbinato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> valido per</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> un</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> is a bit field enumeration, so it is possible for multiple modifier keys to be pressed at the same time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>è un'enumerazione del campo, pertanto è possibile che più tasti di modifica premuto nello stesso momento.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>

trans-unit.source: Use bit operations to determine the exact set of modifier keys pressed.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare le operazioni bit per determinare il set esatto di tasti di modifica premuto.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreModifierKeys* One or more modifier keys, defined by the enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML *oneOrMoreModifierKeys* uno o più tasti di modifica, definiti dal enumerazione, delimitati con un carattere "+".

trans-unit.source: The modifier keys associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: Tasti di modifica associati a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref> associata a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> does not have to be paired with <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> in order to be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>non deve essere abbinato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> valido per</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> un</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The mouse action associated with this gesture.
trans-unit.target: L'azione del mouse è associata a questa azione.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref>.
